Description: Top navigation bar with logo and links
Variants: Transparent, Sticky, Hamburger, Mega Menu, Centered
Accessibility: Skip-to-content link, aria-current for active, keyboard nav, mobile menu focus trap
Animation: Slide down on scroll-up, fade in on load
Best Practices: Logo left, nav right. Max 7 items. Mobile hamburger at 768px
Anti-Patterns: Too many items, no mobile menu, missing skip link

Variants: Collapsible, Mini, Overlay, Persistent, Nested
Accessibility: aria-expanded for collapsible, keyboard nav, focus management
Best Practices: Group related items. Show active state. Collapsible on mobile
Anti-Patterns: Always open on mobile, no collapse, too deep nesting

Description: Large prominent section at top of page
Variants: Image bg, Video bg, Split (text+image), Centered, Gradient
Accessibility: Alt text for bg images, heading hierarchy, CTA focus
Animation: Parallax, fade-in text, scale image on scroll
Best Practices: Single clear CTA. Heading + subheading + CTA. Max 2 CTAs
Anti-Patterns: Multiple CTAs, no clear hierarchy, slow-loading images

Description: Content container with optional image and actions
Variants: Basic, Image top, Horizontal, Overlay, Interactive, Pricing
Accessibility: Entire card clickable if link, alt for images, focus ring
Best Practices: Consistent sizing. Clear hierarchy. Hover feedback
Anti-Patterns: No hover state, inconsistent sizes, too much content

Variants: Primary, Secondary, Ghost, Icon-only, Loading, Disabled
Accessibility: aria-label for icon-only, disabled state, loading state
Animation: Scale 0.98 on press, ripple effect, loading spinner
Best Practices: Min 44x44px touch target. cursor-pointer. Clear label
Anti-Patterns: No hover state, no loading state, too small, no cursor-pointer

Variants: Alert, Confirm, Form, Full-screen, Bottom sheet
Accessibility: Focus trap, Escape to close, aria-modal, return focus
Animation: Fade in backdrop, scale up content 200ms
Best Practices: Max 500px width. Close button top-right. Backdrop click close
Anti-Patterns: No focus trap, no escape close, no backdrop, too wide

Variants: Login, Register, Contact, Search, Multi-step, Inline
Accessibility: Labels with for, error messages, required indicator, autocomplete
Animation: Shake on error, success checkmark, field focus glow
Best Practices: Labels above inputs. Error near field. Disable submit during async
Anti-Patterns: Placeholder as label, error at top only, no validation feedback

Variants: Basic, Sortable, Filterable, Expandable, Virtual scroll
Accessibility: scope on headers, caption, responsive card on mobile
Animation: Row hover highlight, sort arrow animation
Best Practices: Zebra striping. Sticky header. Responsive card layout on mobile
Anti-Patterns: No responsive, no sticky header, too many columns

Variants: Success, Error, Warning, Info, Action, Persistent
Accessibility: aria-live polite, role alert for errors, auto-dismiss
Animation: Slide in from top/bottom, fade out
Best Practices: Auto-dismiss 5s. Max 3 visible. Action button optional
Anti-Patterns: No auto-dismiss, blocking content, no close button

Variants: Basic, Searchable, Multi-select, Grouped, Cascading
Accessibility: aria-expanded, aria-activedescendant, keyboard nav, role listbox
Best Practices: Max 7 visible items. Search for 10+ items. Clear selection
Anti-Patterns: No keyboard nav, too many items without search, no clear

Variants: Horizontal, Vertical, Scrollable, Icon tabs, Badge tabs
Accessibility: role tablist/tab/tabpanel, aria-selected, arrow key nav
Best Practices: Max 7 tabs. Active indicator. Scrollable if overflow
Anti-Patterns: Too many tabs, no active indicator, content jump

Variants: Single open, Multi open, Nested, FAQ style
Accessibility: aria-expanded, aria-controls, Enter/Space to toggle
Best Practices: One open at a time for FAQ. Chevron indicator
Anti-Patterns: No animation, no indicator, auto-close all

Variants: Text, Icon separator, Collapsed, Responsive
Accessibility: nav aria-label breadcrumb, aria-current page, ol/li structure
Best Practices: Max 4-5 levels. Truncate middle on mobile
Anti-Patterns: Too many levels, no current page indicator

Variants: Numbered, Prev/Next, Load more, Infinite scroll, Cursor
Accessibility: aria-label, aria-current, disabled state for bounds
Best Practices: Show current/total. Prev/Next always visible
Anti-Patterns: No current indicator, no bounds handling

Variants: Image, Initials, Icon, Group, Status badge
Accessibility: alt text, role img for initials
Best Practices: Fallback to initials. Status dot for online/offline
Anti-Patterns: No fallback, broken image, no alt

Variants: Count, Status, Removable, Dot, Outline
Accessibility: aria-label for count badges
Best Practices: Max 3 digits. Color-coded status
Anti-Patterns: Too many badges, unclear meaning

Variants: Text, Rich content, Interactive
Accessibility: role tooltip, aria-describedby, delay 300ms
Best Practices: Delay 300ms show. Max 2 lines. Arrow pointer
Anti-Patterns: Instant show, too much content, no arrow

Variants: Linear, Circular, Step, Indeterminate
Accessibility: role progressbar, aria-valuenow, aria-valuemin/max
Animation: Width transition, color change at milestones
Best Practices: Show percentage. Color change at 100%
Anti-Patterns: No label, no percentage, stuck state

Variants: Text lines, Card, Image, Table row, Custom
Accessibility: aria-busy true, aria-label loading
Best Practices: Match actual content layout. Animate shimmer
Anti-Patterns: Static grey blocks, wrong layout, too long

Variants: Basic, Expandable, With filters, Voice, Command palette
Accessibility: role search, aria-label, aria-autocomplete
Animation: Expand on focus, results dropdown fade
Best Practices: Debounce 300ms. Show recent searches. Clear button
Anti-Patterns: No debounce, no clear, no suggestions

Variants: Simple, Multi-column, Mega footer, Sticky, CTA footer
Accessibility: role contentinfo, nav for link groups
Best Practices: Logo + links + social + legal. Max 4 columns
Anti-Patterns: Too many links, no organization, missing legal

Variants: Horizontal, Vertical, Dot, Number, Icon
Accessibility: aria-current step, disabled future steps
Animation: Step transition slide, checkmark on complete
Best Practices: Max 5 steps. Show completed state. Allow back navigation
Anti-Patterns: Too many steps, no back, no progress indication

Variants: Single select, Multi select, Input chips, Removable
Accessibility: role option, aria-selected, keyboard delete to remove
Animation: Scale on select, fade on remove
Best Practices: Group related chips. Show selected count
Anti-Patterns: Too many chips, no grouping, no remove

Variants: Illustration, Action, Search empty, Error empty
Accessibility: Descriptive text, action button focus
Best Practices: Illustration + message + CTA. Be helpful not blaming
Anti-Patterns: Just 'No data', no action, blaming user

Variants: Horizontal, Vertical, With text, Dashed
Accessibility: role separator, aria-orientation
Best Practices: Use sparingly. Consistent style. Text dividers for sections
Anti-Patterns: Overuse, inconsistent styles
